name: Hero Emblem-Fantasy King
description:
COLLECT, MERGE & EVOLVE
Your team of SSRs will eventually be overwhelmed by the forces of evil. Evolve and ascend your heroes to the realm of godhood and defeat your enemies in the name of the Light!

MERGING MADNESS
All those common heroes and equipment that you don’t know what to do with? No worries in Hero Emblem! Just merge them all to get more superior heroes and gear. Earn your SSR heroes and gear with mad merging!
